Nimble Fighter.name: Nimble Fighter
Nimble Fighter.description: Innate: Fizz is permanently  ghosted, and takes 4 (+ 1% AP) reduced pre-mitigation damage from each tick of damage, up to a maximum of 50% reduction.

Urchin Strike.name: Urchin Strike
Urchin Strike.blurb: Fizz dashes through his target, dealing magic damage and applying on hit effects.
Urchin Strike.description: Active: Fizz  dashes a fixed distance towards the target enemy, dealing them  magic damage plus 100% AD physical damage.
Urchin Strike.notes:
* The damage is not dealt up until Fizz reaches the target.
 This means it can be dodged by  blinks,  dashes, and  knockbacks.

  Life steal applies only on the physical damage component while  spell vamp applies to both the physical damage and bonus magic damage.

Seastone Trident.name: Seastone Trident
Seastone Trident.blurb: Fizz's attacks bleed his enemies, dealing magic damage over several seconds. Fizz can empower his next attack to deal bonus damage, increased by how long the bleed was active on his target.
Seastone Trident.description: Passive: Fizz's basic attacks rend enemies on-hit, dealing magic damage every 0.5 seconds for 3 seconds, refreshing on-hit.
Seastone Trident.leveling: Total Magic Damage:20 / 30 / 40 / 50 / 60 (+ 40% AP)Magic Damage per Tick:3.33 / 5 / 6.67 / 8.33 / 10 (+ 6.67% AP)
Seastone Trident.description2: Active: Fizz's next basic attack is empowered, dealing bonus magic damage and gaining  50 bonus range.
Seastone Trident.description3: If Seastone Trident kills its target, its  cooldown is reduced to 1 second and refunds  mana. Otherwise, if Seastone Trident doesn't kill its target, Fizz's basic attacks gain bonus on-hit magic damage for 5 seconds.
Seastone Trident.leveling3:
Mana Refunded:20 / 28 / 36 / 44 / 52
Bonus On-Hit Damage:10 / 15 / 20 / 25 / 30 (+ 35% AP)
Seastone Trident.description4: Seastone Trident resets Fizz's autoattack timer.
Seastone Trident.notes:
* The triggering attack applies  proc damage and the bleed deals  default damage.
 The active does not trigger spell effects.

Playful.name: Playful
Playful.blurb: Fizz hops into the air, landing gracefully upon his spear and becoming untargetable. From this position, Fizz can either slam the ground or choose to jump again before smashing back down.
Playful.description: Active: Fizz  vaults towards the target location, becoming  untargetable for up to 0.75 seconds while balancing on his trident. While balancing, Fizz gains the ability to cast  Trickster.
Playful.description2: Fizz then splashes onto the ground below him, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and  slowing them for 2 seconds.
Playful.notes:
* After Playful is used (without activating Trickster) Fizz can orientate his landing by right-clicking before/as he drops for a longer reach (but same radius) on the slow/damage.
 Playful cannot be used for approximately 0.5 seconds after using  Urchin Strike.
  Flash can be used during both dashes.
 The untargetability partially cancels if  Fizz is  disabled during it (because of effects such as  Power Fist), allowing non on-target effects to hit him.

Trickster.name: Trickster
Trickster.blurb: Fizz hops into the air, landing gracefully upon his spear and becoming untargetable. From this position, Fizz can either slam the ground or choose to jump again before smashing back down.
Trickster.description: Active: Fizz dismounts from his trident toward the target location in quick succession. Upon landing, he deals magic damage to nearby enemies. The damage dealt is the same as  Playful's, but in a smaller radius, and without applying the  slow.
Trickster.description2: Both  dashes may be directed separately.
Trickster.notes: *  Flash can be used during both dashes.

Chum the Waters.name: Chum the Waters
Chum the Waters.blurb: Fizz tosses a fish in a direction that attaches to any champion that touches it, slowing the target. After a short delay, a shark erupts from the ground, knocking up the target and knocking any nearby enemies aside. All enemies hit are dealt magic damage and slowed.
Chum the Waters.description: Active: Fizz throws down a lure in the target direction that attracts a shark, causing it to emerge after 2 seconds, dealing magic damage,  knocking aside surrounding enemies and  slowing them for 2 seconds. The further the lure travels in its initial flight, the larger the shark that is attracted, increasing its slow, eruption radius and knockback distance.
Chum the Waters.description2: Guppy (<455): 40% slow, 200 eruption radius and 150 unit knockback distance.
Chum the Waters.description3: Chomper (455-910): 60% slow, 325 eruption radius and 250 unit knockback distance.
Chum the Waters.description4: Gigalodon (>910): 80% slow, 450 eruption radius and 350 unit knockback distance.
Chum the Waters.description5: If an enemy  champion intercepts the lure, it binds to them and causes the shark to emerge at their position. The lure's holder is  slowed for the duration and  knocked up for 1 second instead of away.
Chum the Waters.notes:
* If the attached target dies before the shark emerges, Chum the Waters's downtime is ended prematurely.
  Spell shield negates the attachment and can absorb the effects from the shark's emergence (the damage, the  displacement, and the  slow).
 Chum the Waters will stop its movement upon colliding with  Yasuo's  Wind Wall (it does not set destroyed).
 Only the slow can be removed by  cleansing effects.
 Chum the Waters can hit  stealthed units and will  reveal them.
